de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator

Class MaterialDialogDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.AbstractDialogDecorator<Dialog>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.MaterialDialogDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dialog, MaterialDialogDecorator

    public class MaterialDialogDecorator
extends AbstractDialogDecorator<Dialog>
implements MaterialDialogDecorator
    A decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices.
    Since:
    3.2.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MaterialDialogDecorator(Dialog dialog)
      Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Drawable getBackground()
      Returns the background of the dialog.

      Returns the icon of the dialog.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MaterialDialogDecorator

        public MaterialDialogDecorator(@NonNull
                               Dialog dialog)
        Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog, whose view hierarchy should be modified by the decorator, as an instance of the type Dialog. The dialog may not be null
